field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes below.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must indicate the type of content included in this submission.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box below.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Princeton Project Grant Number
field.hint: Enter the number for the Princeton project grant number that should be charged for this submission.
field.required: You must enter a project grant number for billing purposes.

field.label: Depositor
field.hint: Enter the names of the person entering this record.
field.required: You must enter the name of the person depositing this record.

field.label: Language

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.
field.required: You must enter subject keywords.

field.label: Version
field.hint: Indicate the version of this item.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below.
field.required: You must enter an abstract for this item.

field.label: Table of Contents
field.hint: Enter a description of each file contained in this item or a description of each file's contents.

field.label: Relation (Is Part Of A Series)
field.hint: Please indicate the name of the series and the number within that series, if available.

field.label: Relation (Is Referenced By)
field.hint: If this item is referenced by another item contained within this repository or another archive, enter the URI / URL of the corresponding item.

field.label: Relation (Is Replaced By)
field.hint: If this item is replaced by another item contained within this repository or another archive, enter the URI / URL of the corresponding item.

field.label: Relation (Replaces)
field.hint: If this item replaces another item contained within this repository or another archive, enter the URI / URL of the corresponding item.

field.label: Relation (Is Version Of)
field.hint: If there is another version of this dataset contained within this repository or another archive, enter the URI / URL of the corresponding item.

field.label: Princeton Project Grant Number
field.hint: Enter the number for the Princeton project grant number that should be charged for this submission.
field.required: You must enter a project grant number for billing purposes.

field.label: One: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Depositor
field.hint: Enter the name of the person entering this record.
field.required: You must enter a Depositor for this dataset.

field.label: Data Creator
field.hint: Enter the names of the data creators / principal investigators of this item below. If the name of the data creator is unknown please be sure to fill out the Publisher field.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the dataset.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this dataset.

field.label: Alternative Title
field.hint: If the dataset has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Dataset Description (abstract)
field.hint: Please provide a summary description of the dataset or an abstract of the study in which the data was generated.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must enter a type for this dataset.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter as many appropriate subject keywords or phrases as you like.

field.label: Funder
field.hint: Indicate any agencies that funded the creation of the dataset (if applicable).

field.label: Data Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the organisation or service responsible for making the data available. Example: Princeton University. Institute for Computational Science and Engineering Note: Publisher is a mandatory field if no Creator is specified.
field.required: Publisher is mandatory.

field.label: Spatial Coverage
field.hint:
Enter the geographic coverage of the data from country to city level following the examples. Include states/territories for places in the U.S. and Canada.
Examples: "United States--New Jersey--Princeton"
"France--Paris"

field.label: Temporal Coverage:
field.hint:
Enter the date or date range which pertains to the data using the W3CDTF specification: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD
Examples: "start=1992; end=2002;"
"start=1992-12-15; end=1994-01-23;"
"start=2001-01-01T00:00:00+05:00; end=2002-01-01T00:00:00+05:00;"

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the data files and/or documentation.

field.label: Source
field.hint: Name any primary source(s) from which these data are derived. Optionally, add a URI /URL to the source. Example: 2001 Census; Census Area Statistics.

field.label: Dataset Description (TOC)
field.hint: Enter names of each data and documentation files associated with this item along with a brief description for each file. If descriptions for each file are contained within one of the submitted files (such as a Readme.txt file) then indicate that that file should be consulted for table of contents information.

field.label: Relation (Is Version Of)
field.hint: If there is another version of this dataset lodged in this repository or another archive enter the URI / URL of the corresponding item.

field.label: Relation (Is Referenced By)
field.hint: If this dataset is referenced by an electronic publication(s) enter the URI /URL of that publication(s).

field.label: Supercedes
field.hint: If this dataset supercedes an earlier dataset deposited in this repository enter the URI /URL of the previous dataset.

field.label: Princeton Project Grant Number
field.hint: Enter the number for the Princeton project grant number that should be charged for this submission.
field.required: You must enter a project grant number for billing purposes.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the student's name.
field.required: You must enter the student's name.

field.label: Primary advisor
field.hint: Enter name(s) of the primary advisor(s).
field.required: You must enter the primary advisor's name.

field.label: Secondary advisors
field.hint: Enter name(s) of the secondary advisor.

field.label: Department name
field.hint: Enter the name/s of the student's department/s. (In some cases, a student may have more than one deparment, for instance Creative Writing and English.) If a student has two departments, select the first department, hold down the “Ctrl” key on a Windows PC or the "Command" key on an Apple PC, and then scroll to and select the second department. Both departments should then appear highlighted.
field.required: You must enter the student's department name/s.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of the thesis.
field.required: You must enter title for the thesis.

field.label: Number of pages
field.hint: Enter the number of pages in the PDF file. Only enter the number of pages without any additional text, e.g. 96
field.required: You must enter the number of pages in the thesis.

field.label: Date the thesis was created
field.hint: Enter the date this thesis was created/submitted (use date of submission if creation date is not available).
field.required: You must enter the creation (or submission) date of the thesis.

field.label: Graduation Year
field.hint: Enter the four digit year (e.g. 2010) in which the student graduated.
field.required: You must enter the student's graduation year.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the thesis (if available).

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language in which the thesis is written.
field.required: You must select the language.

field.label: Date of Creation
field.hint: Please give the date on which this item was created.

field.label: General Description
field.hint: Describe this item.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Princeton Project Grant Number
field.hint: Enter the number for the Princeton project grant number that should be charged for this submission.
field.required: You must enter a project grant number for billing purposes.
